fields.name: maxlags
fields.title: MaxLags
fields.description: Maximum number of lags to check for order selection, defaults to 12 * (nobs/100.)**(1./4), see select_order function

fields.name: ic
fields.title: Information Criterion
fields.description: Information criterion to use for VAR order selection. They can be aic:Akaike, fpe:Final prediction error, hqic:Hannan-Quinn, bic:Bayesian

fields.name: trend
fields.title: Trend
fields.description: One of these trends can be used c:add constant, ct:constant and trend, ctt:constant,linear and quadratic trend, n:no constant and no trend
